name: Jack Daniel's® Fudge
author: Yoly
summary: This recipe makes a small batch of boozy fudge. Satisfy your craving without overindulging. I buy a 7-ounce can of sweetened condensed milk, make this fudge, and have enough leftover to sweeten my coffee for a few days.
directions: Line a 5x7-inch dish with foil, leaving an overhang for easy removal
Place chocolate chips in a glass bowl and microwave for 1 minute
Stir and keep microwaving at 15-second intervals, stirring each time until chocolate is melted
Add sweetened condensed milk, whiskey, vanilla, and salt
Stir until all ingredients are incorporated
Pour fudge into the lined dish and let set, 2 to 3 hours
Lift out of the dish using the foil overhang and cut into 24 squares
